title: Unlocked Challenger Ahri on Snowdown Shop but an error pops up and I can't buy it
body:
Hello

So after going into the Snowdown Shop and unlocking my discounts, I was surprised to find Challenger Ahri. However, when I tried to buy her, an error popped up:
http://i.imgur.com/fRSVkcC.png
It told me to keep trying and even after many attempts, I kept getting the same error. 

I thought there was maybe some error with the shop so I bought Heartseeker Ashe (Cheapest) to see if I could buy it or not. I was able to buy Heartseeker Ashe so I was a bit confused.
http://i.imgur.com/aNO9Cvh.jpg

I've tied restarting the client, still no fix.
Summoner name (If this helps): ecicow

replies.body: This same thing happened to me. Also, was there any notification to say when abouts the skin would go back on sale?

Hey Ecicow,

Thank you for your report. I've passed on your information to Riot. I'm sorry for the inconvenience, and I'll do my best to provide some visibility on the issue once more information becomes available.

UPDATE: At this time, you're advised to submit a ticket to Riot Games Player Support so that they can assist you further. You can do that on the Riot Games Support website at: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Thanks for the quick reply.

I'll send in a ticket now, thanks
its not suppose to be up for buying...... riot accidentally put it in there....... so thats why youre getting the error cause i got the same thing ): so i went to google and found out

That was the Snowstorm sale on the actual store where Riot accidentally put Challenger Ahri on the list of champions being discounted. The Snowdown Shop is a different event, I don't think they would make the same mistake of allowing Challenger Ahri to be pulled again :/

EDIT: Looks like Challenger Ahri is a skin that is meant to be on sale on special occasions and is going on sale on January so you are probably right, however, if we can't get Challenger Ahri, wouldn't that be a waste of 1 discount slot?
